txt.en: 'Well, now that you have a place to live, [placeholder], you should certainly consider buying some furniture and other comforts for it. I recommend you speak with Bill Twiggins. You can find his shop in the market square of the community... I'm sure he'll be able to help you out!'

'What's that? You bought a house? Wonderful!

'I'm sorry, but things have been awfully busy around here of late, and I've something of a backlog to work through, but have no fear! I'll not send you away empty-handed. Old Bill does right by his customers, he does!

'Here you go! A little something to get you started with your fine new home.'
You now have a place to call home, but it would be even nicer with some fine decorations.
Bill Twiggins is in the market square of the Bree homestead.\n\nNan Henwood has sent you to speak with Bill Twiggins in hopes that he can help you furnish your home.
